
# Library to be used
- use github.com/labstack/echo/v4 for http server 
- use github.com/mark3labs/mcp-go for mcp
- user github.com/spf13/viper for config
- use github.com/spf13/cobra for cli interface

## Tools
- `order.create`	Creates an order
- `order.fetch`	    Fetch order details

## logging
- use logrus for logging
- use logrus to log to file and console
